message.content:
Dear Boss,
I regret to inform you that I will be leaving the company on May 31st. This decision was not easy for me, but it is necessary for personal reasons.
My resignation will allow me to pursue other opportunities and focus on my family. Please know that I appreciate the support and guidance you have provided during my time here.
Please let me know if there are any questions or concerns regarding this transition.
Sincerely,
Your Name
